Package com.company

Class FileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.FileManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class FileManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class that manages the information from the file
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Bogdan Cirstoiu (Instructors), Constantin Mihail (Classes), Satish Gurung (Members)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      FileManager()
      A no parameters constructor that initializes the file handler

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.ArrayList<GymClass> getAllClasses()
      A method that returns all the classes from the binary file
      java.util.ArrayList<Instructor> getAllInstructors()
      A method that returns all the instructors from the binary file by reading the list from the file and casting it to the instructor type, and then returning that list
      java.util.ArrayList<Member> getAllMembers()
      A method that gets all of the members from the binary file
      void removeAllFromInstructorsFile()
      A method that removes everything the from instructor file by writing an empty list in the file
      void removeClass​(GymClass gymClass)
      A method that removes a certain class from the binary file
      void removeInstructor​(Instructor instructor)
      A method that removes an instructor from the file, by first getting the full list of instructors, and then searching for the one we want to remove, removing it, and then re-writing the list to the file.
      void removeMember​(Member member)
      A method that removes a certain member from the file
      void saveClass​(GymClass object)
      A method that saves a new class by first getting the full list of classes, adding it, and then re-writing the list to the file
      void saveInstructor​(java.lang.Object object)
      A method that saves an instructor into the binary file by first getting the full list of already created instructors, adding the specified instructor to that list, and writing it back to the file.
      void saveMember​(Member member)
      A method that saves a member to the binary file by getting the full list of already existing ones, adding it into the list and then re-writing it to the file

        A no parameters constructor that initializes the file handler

    • Method Detail

      • saveInstructor

        public void saveInstructor​(java.lang.Object object)
        A method that saves an instructor into the binary file by first getting the full list of already created instructors, adding the specified instructor to that list, and writing it back to the file.
        Parameters:
        object - the object that needs to be saved

      • removeInstructor

        public void removeInstructor​(Instructor instructor)
        A method that removes an instructor from the file, by first getting the full list of instructors, and then searching for the one we want to remove, removing it, and then re-writing the list to the file.
        Parameters:
        instructor - the instructor that needs to get removed

      • getAllInstructors

        public java.util.ArrayList<Instructor> getAllInstructors()
        A method that returns all the instructors from the binary file by reading the list from the file and casting it to the instructor type, and then returning that list
        Returns:
        instructorArrayList, an ArrayList of all the instructors

      • removeAllFromInstructorsFile

        public void removeAllFromInstructorsFile()
        A method that removes everything the from instructor file by writing an empty list in the file

        public void saveClass​(GymClass object)
        A method that saves a new class by first getting the full list of classes, adding it, and then re-writing the list to the file
        Parameters:
        object - the class that needs to be saved

        public void removeClass​(GymClass gymClass)

        A method that returns all the classes from the binary file
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all the classes

      • saveMember

        public void saveMember​(Member member)
        A method that saves a member to the binary file by getting the full list of already existing ones, adding it into the list and then re-writing it to the file
        Parameters:
        member - the member that needs to be saved

        A method that removes a certain member from the file
